sub_title: MarCom Intern at BISSELL | Rotaract Marketing & Social Media Committee | THUAS International Communication Management Alumni
summary:
Result-driven Communication Management student at The Hague University of Applied Sciences, seeking for an internship in Public Relations or Corporate Communications. I have developed skills in strategy development, analysis and research, organization and planning,  creative concept development, and negotiation. During my studies, I had the opportunity to work with companies such as DSM, and Rustic Pastry.  

I am passionate about traveling and cultures; therefore, I studied abroad in Japan as a high school student and later applied to the Netherlands, and currently, I am doing my semester abroad in Jakarta. Being an international and exchange student made me repeatedly exposed to new cultures and diverse groups of people, which has made me able to adapt quickly to changes, and gain a broader perspective of different communication styles and cultures. I am passionate about helping people, being creative, and finding solutions for various issues; also I am detail-oriented and I keep my goals and tasks organized to maintain productivity.

I believe that the skills I have attained from the dynamic environment and competitive university life define me and I am looking forward to implementing and polishing them in any opportunity that I receive.

awards.title: Rotary Youth Exchange Program
awards.description: I was granted a scholarship to study abroad, and experience the culture. Lastly, represent my country to my host club in Japan.

awards.title: Europe Winner of UNEP International Childrens Painting Competition
awards.description:
United Nations Environmental Programme organized the 24th Children Painting Competition: “Think Eat Save: Reduce your Footprint” campaign. I have been selected as the European regional winner.

The goal of the program is the increase environmental awareness and encourage children to make a difference.

https://www.unep.org/node/6490

awards.title: International Bronze Prize Winner of Toyota Dream Car
awards.description:
Children connect around to word to draw their dream car that aims to change out society for a better future. I was honored to be selected for the national competition for first price in my age category. Afterwards, I had the please to be selected as one of the Bronze Prize winner international, and to travel to Japan and culturally exchange with the other contestants.

https://pin.it/6wmWiIR

projects.title: Rotaract End of the Year Party - Social Media Campaign
projects.description: During my time with Rotaract, I actively contributed to a successful fundraising campaign supporting a nonprofit in Africa. As part of the Marketing and Communication Team, I crafted compelling content and played a key role in organizing a highly impactful fundraising event. It was fulfilling to witness the positive impact of our efforts in generating awareness and support for vital initiatives in Africa. This experience strengthened my dedication to making a difference through event marketing and global causes.

projects.title: Peer Mediation - Global Governance Innovators Lab
projects.description: An innovative project where students collaborate together with researchers and lecturers with the aim of developing new solutions on the theme of "Justice for All". The project included discussions with experts on peer mediation, literature research, and field research (questionnaires among students). Moreover, developing a toolkit with three recommendations for implementing peer mediation within THUAS.

courses.name: Crisi Communication Tactics: Handling Issues & Trending in PR

profile_positions.description:
BISSELL is a company that specializes in manufacturing and selling home cleaning and floor care products. They offer various innovative solutions, including vacuum, carpet, steam mops, sweepers, and other cleaning accessories. Their mission is to provide customers with the tools they need to maintain cleaner and healthier living environments while also promoting a positive impact on the community and the environment. BISSELL's commitment to pet owners goes beyond just product development. They often collaborate with animal shelters and rescue organizations, supporting pet adoption initiatives and advocating for the well-being of animals.

- Curating engaging and on-brand content for our social media platforms to connect with our audience and strengthen brand loyalty.
- Working closely with external agencies to develop compelling social media content that aligns with our brand vision and values.
- Creating comprehensive and insightful briefing documents to guide external agencies in the development of assets localization.
- Building and nurturing relationships with distributors to facilitate effective product launches and promotions.
- Supporting the Marketing Communication team in organizing and delivering campaign assets, ensuring seamless execution.
- Filming captivating TikTok videos in-house to drive engagement and awareness on this popular social platform.
- Working cross-functionally with various departments to ensure centralized delivery and storage of marketing materials for each product launches.
- Collaborating with colleagues for localization and adaptation of product videos for various digital platforms.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communications Intern

profile_positions.description:
Rotaract is a global service organization that provides young adults between the ages of 18 and 30 with opportunities to develop leadership skills, serve their communities, and promote international understanding. Rotaract is a program sponsored by Rotary International, a well-known international service organization.

- Spearheaded the activation of a fundraising campaign supporting a nonprofit organization in Africa, contributing to a successful event that raised essential funds for the cause.
-Collaborated with the Marketing and Communication Team, actively engaging in content brainstorming and copywriting to ensure compelling and impactful messaging.
- Played a pivotal role in promoting the event and driving community engagement, fostering awareness and support for the nonprofit's mission.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communication and Public Relations Specialist

profile_positions.description:
During my exchange program, I had the privilege of working with my host university's PR team, contributing to content creation for diverse communication channels aimed at informing and engaging fellow students. It was an enriching experience where I actively assisted in providing valuable information to the student community.

- Introduced creative and engaging social media content ideas to enhance brand visibility and engagement.
- Led content creation and caption writing for Social Media platforms including TikTok and Instagram.
- Designed and edited captivating Instagram Reels and Posts to drive audience interaction.
- Utilized Indesign and Photoshop skills to create eye-catching Posters and Flyers for marketing campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Public Relations Intern

profile_positions.description:
Worked part-time during school for a sophisticated restaurant. 
I was reliable to serve customers and deal with their requests.
Precision was an important aspect of the restaurant, therefore I learned how to soften my communication, and serving skills.
profile_positions.title: Food Runner

profile_positions.description:
Work part-time during school and summer for a beach restaurant. 
Responsible for interacting with customers taking orders as well as dealing with complaints and requests.
Served the customers and took on the role of a host or bar at busy times. 

Skills obtained: 
 -Learned to be flexible to accommodate changes.
 -Build relationships with customers and colleagues.
 -Handled different behavior, and acted as a team during critical times. 
 -Multitasking, and prioritizing tasks, while serving customers and completing various tasks around the restaurant.
profile_positions.title: Food Runner

profile_positions.description:
- Work part-time over the holidays for a sightseeing company. It involved communicating and navigating with customers, which improved my communication skills and to be diplomatic.
 - Learned how to work in a team in crisis situations, which helped me improve my creativity and solve the issue quickly.
profile_positions.title: Hostess

profile_positions.description:
During my sophomore year of high school, I received a Rotary scholarship to study in Japan for one year. 
I lived together with host families and attended Yamate girl’s high school in Kobe.
During this experience, I was able to pass the N3 level of the Japanese Language Proficiency Test (JLPT), made connections, and gained a firsthand understanding of Japanese culture.
profile_positions.title: Exchange Student

profile_positions.description:
Károly Kisfaludy High School in Mohács has been invited to participate in the European Parliament's Ambassador's school program. The main aim of the program is to raise young people's awareness of Europe and European democracy, giving them an active knowledge of the European Union and the European Parliament. 

I have developed creative concepts, created a Facebook page, and organized events to raise awareness of the European Parliament and democracy, at the end of the year we traveled to the capital to participate in an event organized by the European Parliament.
profile_positions.title: Member of European Parliament's Ambassador's program

volunteer_experiences.description:
The ICM Student Marcom Team is a student-driven group allied to the International Communication (ICM) programme of The Hague University of Applied Science in the Netherlands. 

The students organize a variety of Marcom-related activities by participating in a series of information sessions, workshops under the supervision of a team of university lecturers.

 - Digital Content Creator: Contributed to the ICM online Party Event by designing an event poster.
I was part of Rotary's volunteer program in Hungary and Japan. I mainly contributed to social services and environmental causes.
